scripts.postinstall:
(echo '
Running updates on existing data...' && (cd questions && git pull && cd ../img && git pull && cd ..)) || (echo '
Pulling data via SSH...' && (git clone git@github.com:EtudieCA/questions.git && git clone git@github.com:EtudieCA/img.git)) || (echo '
Pulling data via HTTPS...' && (git clone https://github.com/EtudieCA/questions && git clone https://github.com/EtudieCA/img))
